trans-unit.source: Indicates that the implementing property is interested in participating in activation and might not have provided a message sink.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a propriedade de implementação está interessada em participando de ativação e não pode ter fornecido um coletor de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The IContextPropertyActivator interface is exposed on all <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context> properties that are interested in participating in activation and that might have not provided a message sink.
trans-unit.target: A interface IContextPropertyActivator é exposta em todos os <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>propriedades que estão interessados em participando de ativação e que talvez não forneceu um coletor de mensagem.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>

trans-unit.source: Client <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context> properties send information in the construction message that their counterparts at the remote site could look for during activation.
trans-unit.target: Cliente <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>Propriedades enviar informações na mensagem de construção que suas contrapartes no site remoto podem procurar durante a ativação.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>

trans-unit.source: IContextPropertyActivator is also used to collect information from the client and server context property and to deliver information from the server context properties to the client context properties when returning to the client <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>.
trans-unit.target: IContextPropertyActivator também é usado para coletar informações de propriedade de contexto de cliente e servidor e para fornecer informações do servidor de propriedades de contexto para as propriedades de contexto do cliente ao retornar para o cliente <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>

trans-unit.source: Called on each client context property that has this interface, before the construction request leaves the client.
trans-unit.target: Chamado em cada propriedade de contexto de cliente que tenha essa interface, antes que a solicitação de construção deixa o cliente.

trans-unit.source: The context property can examine and manipulate the contents of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto pode examinar e manipular o conteúdo de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called on each server context property that has this interface, before the construction response leaves the server for the client.
trans-unit.target: Chamado em cada propriedade de contexto de servidor que tenha essa interface, antes que a resposta de construção deixa o servidor para o cliente.

trans-unit.source: The context property can examine and manipulate the contents of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto pode examinar e manipular o conteúdo de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called on each client context property that has this interface, when the construction request returns to the client from the server.
trans-unit.target: Chamado em cada propriedade de contexto de cliente que tenha essa interface, quando a solicitação de construção retorna ao cliente do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The current method is called on each server context property that implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextPropertyActivator> interface when a construction request arrives at a server.
trans-unit.target: O método atual é chamado em cada propriedade de contexto de servidor que implementa o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextPropertyActivator>quando uma solicitação de construção chega em um servidor de interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextPropertyActivator>

trans-unit.source: This allows the context property to examine the contents of each <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que a propriedade de contexto examinar o conteúdo de cada <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called on each client context property that has this interface, when the construction request returns to the client from the server.
trans-unit.target: Chamado em cada propriedade de contexto de cliente que tenha essa interface, quando a solicitação de construção retorna ao cliente do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The context property can examine the contents of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto pode examinar o conteúdo de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether it is all right to activate the object type indicated in the msg parameter.
trans-unit.target: Indica se todos os direitos é ativar o tipo de objeto indicado no msg parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the requested type can be activated.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se o tipo solicitado pode ser ativado.
